meanings: (유도) immobilization (on the mat), a mat hold
(씨름) pressing ((a person)) down with one's body

vlive.korean: 본체 버튼 누르기가 귀찮아서 게임을 안 했다 이 말씀이에요? You don't play games because you're too tired to press a button? 듣기 View video ATEEZ : 돌아온 산밍키!!
vlive.english: You don't play games because you're too tired to press a button?

vlive.korean: 근데 유튜브 사람에게는 좋아요를 누르기 위해서... For YouTube viewers, "How to click Like It". 듣기 View video KKOSISTERS : 워너원 부메랑 MV 메이크업 Wanna One Boomerang Makeup
vlive.english: For YouTube viewers, "How to click Like It".

vlive.korean: 그렇다면 지금부터 본격 하트 누르기를 시작합니다! Then we'll officially start pressing the heart button! 듣기 View video 위에화엔터테인먼트(YUEHUA Entertainment) : [♥ Mission] 형섭X의웅 하트를 부르는 애교 ㅠㅠ
vlive.english: Then we'll officially start pressing the heart button!

vlive.korean: 어떡해, 이미 인싸템이야 - 누르기만 하면 되는 거야? He'll get an item. - Do I just have to click that button? 듣기 View video Dispatch : ★웰컴 투 인싸월드★ ➁ (뉴이스트 W : NU’EST W)
